name: midwest
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an area in the US that includes Ohio, Indiana, Michigan, Illinois, Wisconsin, Iowa, Minnesota, Nebraska, Missouri, and Kansas: Much of the Midwest is currently under about 2 feet of snow.
More examplesFewer examplesWe spent a month travelling in the Midwest.These issues are important in the Midwest.The president has a lot of support in the Midwest.

the north central part of the US which includes Ohio, Indiana, Michigan, Illinois, Wisconsin, Iowa, Minnesota, Nebraska, Missouri, and Kansas: The drought has destroyed grain crops across much of the Midwest. Midwestern adjective us
